mapper.sql: sys_id, order_no, entity_id, user_id, appointment_cates, related_no, appoint_date, time_from, time_to, address, status, institution_id, department_id, service_option, appraisal, is_cancelled, creation_time, create_by, edit_time, edit_by
mapper.select:
select ub.user_id,-- id ub.full_name,-- 姓名 ub.gender,-- 性别 TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, ub.date_of_birth, CURDATE()) AS user_age,-- 年龄 oa.entity_id,-- 公司名称 oa.time_to,-- 截至时间 oa.status -- 状态 from order_appointment as oa LEFT JOIN user_basic as ub ON oa.user_id=ub.user_id
where oa.related_no=#{params.relatedNo} and oa.status=1

SELECT ub.full_name, ub.gender, ub.head_image, oa.is_cancelled, oa.order_no, oa.address, oa.appoint_date, oai.amount, FLOOR(DATEDIFF(now(), ub.date_of_birth)/365.2422) age FROM order_appointment oa LEFT JOIN user_basic ub on oa.user_id = ub.user_id LEFT JOIN order_additional_info oai on oai.order_no = oa.order_no LEFT JOIN exam_handover_sheet ehs on ehs.order_no = oa.order_no where oa.related_no = #{params.nurseNo}
and ehs.person_barcode_confirmed = 0 AND ehs.draw_completed = 0 AND ehs.is_handovered = 0 and oa.is_cancelled = 0
and ehs.person_barcode_confirmed = 1 AND ehs.is_handovered = 0 and oa.is_cancelled = 0
and oa.is_cancelled = 1
and ehs.person_barcode_confirmed = 1 AND ehs.draw_completed = 1 AND ehs.is_handovered = 1 and oa.is_cancelled = 0
AND YEARWEEK(date_format(oa.creation_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now())
AND DATE_FORMAT(oa.creation_time, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m')
AND to_days(oa.creation_time) = to_days(now())

select ub.user_id,-- id ub.full_name,-- 姓名 ub.gender,-- 性别 TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, ub.date_of_birth, CURDATE()) AS user_age,-- 年龄 oa.entity_id,-- 公司名称 oa.time_to,-- 截至时间 oa.status -- 状态 from order_appointment as oa LEFT JOIN user_basic as ub ON oa.user_id=ub.user_id where oa.related_no=#{params.relatedNo} and oa.status=#{params.status} and oa.appointment_cates=5 UNION select eha.user_id,-- id ub.full_name,-- 姓名 ub.gender,-- 性别 TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, ub.date_of_birth, CURDATE()) AS user_age, eha.entity_no,-- 公司名称 eha.time_to,-- 截至时间 eha.status from entity_healthy_appointment as eha LEFT JOIN user_basic as ub ON eha.user_id=ub.user_id WHERE eha.related_no=#{params.relatedNo} and eha.status=#{params.status} and eha.pkg_main_id=8 and eha.pkg_detail_id=801
mapper.update: update order_appointment SET status=#{status} WHERE order_no=#{orderNo}
update order_appointment SET is_cancelled=#{isCancelled} WHERE order_no=#{orderNo}
mapper.select: SELECT oa.order_no, oa.entity_id, oa.user_id, oa.address, oa.appointment_cates, oa.appoint_date, oa.status, si.`name` institutionName, oa.is_cancelled, oa.related_no, oa.service_option, oa.time_from FROM order_appointment oa LEFT JOIN sys_institution si on si.institution_id = oa.institution_id WHERE oa.order_no = #{params.orderNo}
